'''Paul Craig Roberts''' was the Assistant Secretary of the Treasury for Economic Policy under President Reagan in 1981, and after that became an editor for the Wall Street Journal and a Distinguished Fellow at the Cato Institute.

Since at least 2014, he's been a columnist for [https://russia-insider.com/en/paul_craig_roberts Russian Insider] and [https://sputniknews.com/authors/paul_craig_roberts/ Russian state-owned outlet Sputnik], writing articles with titles like "America Has No Unifying Moral Culture-It Will Lose A War Against Russia," "Will Putin Realize That Russia Holds All The Cards?" and "Privatization Is The Atlanticist Strategy To Attack Russia."
